data.title: Learn to tap into what drives people, and gain the power to inspire and increase your company's overall growth.
data.meta_description: Whether customers or employees, people drive your business. Learn to tap into what drives people, gain the power to inspire, and increase overall growth. Partner with Perspective Consulting, and learn how to better understand the people that drive your business, and increase your power and results.
data.text:
With the current unemployment rate an at all-time low, finding the right talent can not only be extremely difficult, but also costly and time consuming. Utilizing the Predictive Index Assessment Suite has provided us with the tools needed to match candidates to the right jobs during this tough talent recession.”

The Predictive Index and Amy Leslie have been by far, our best investment made this year. We’ve struggled with turnover in our industry because the demands of our positions are very unique. Operating a service driven company that is open 24 hours a day, 7 days a week takes a special individual. We knew this was the perfect tool and just what we needed to accomplish our goals of hiring the right candidates and retaining key performers. Helping our Leadership team initiate personal growth for each individual has been an amazing asset we are currently adopting. ​ I’m very excited to share this new tool we’ve adopted with our other business partners so they too can benefit from this amazing tool as well.
